parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The content type to return. Default value: page. Valid values: page, blogpost.

parameter.name: spaceKey
parameter.description: The space key to find content under.

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: The title of the page to find. Required for page type.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: List of statuses the content to be found is in. Defaults to current is not specified.

parameter.name: postingDay
parameter.description: The posting day of the blog post. Required for blogpost type. Format: yyyy-mm-dd.

parameter.name: expand
parameter.description: A comma separated list of properties to expand on the content. Default value: history,space,version.

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: The start point of the collection to return.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The limit of the number of items to return, this may be restricted by fixed system limits.
